long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Simple and easy!  NO registration, NO mail requested!

With a single click, get instant notifications of price increases/decreases for your chosen products on major shopping websites.

Some supported websites :
âœ… Aliexpress
âœ… Amazon (Perfect companion of Keepa with no registration for price alerts)
âœ… Banggood
âœ… eBay
âœ… Geekbuying
etc.

If you want more compatible sites, please rate us 5 stars and mention them in the comments ;-)

---

Technical and functional transparency:

âœ… Simple Price Alerts periodically checks the price of selected products. The interval between checks is adjustable: 1 hour (default) or 12 hours.

âœ… Following Google's latest recommendations, Simple Price Alerts uses the secure Fetch API to download the necessary data.

âœ… A developer mode allows you to view logs of the URLs checked in the background.

âœ… Simple Price Alerts may offer affiliate links for products. This feature can be disabled in the user interface settings.

âœ… Simple Price Alerts requires read and write permissions on visited pages to check displayed prices and add a notification bell directly on the page.
